name: market for tyre wear emissions, lorry | tyre wear emissions, lorry | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10801/documentation

This is a market activity, representing a treatment mix. In the case of products needing treatment, market mixes are supplied by the activities treating the product in the geography defined by the market, and they supply the activities needing to treat the product, as they have generated it as a by-product in the Undefined processes (present as a negative input in system models). Transport to the treating facility or losses are also accounted in this type of markets, when relevant.;This is the market for  'tyre wear emissions, lorry', in the Global geography.;This market should not have any transport at all, the transport present in ecoinvent v3.1 was removed for ecoinvent v3.2.

The activity starts with the input from the treatment processes.

A market for a material for treatment (wastes or recyclables) ends with the provision of treatment, i.e. a mix of treatment providers, to activities that generate the reference product as a waste/by-product.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste

exchanges.description:
Road freight specific non-exhaust emissions.



This dataset and the emission factors within it relate to 1kg of tyre wear. In order to use the treatment of non-exhaust emissions in a transport dataset the quantity of emissions per km must be calculated. Non-exhaust emissions are considered to be linearly scalable to gross vehicle weight (GVW). For tyre wear emissions from lorries the specific quantity is 8.15E-8 kg/kg GVW*km.
